Hello, I am PaCmAn, and yes, I am the one who got the idear
and used alot of time and effort starting up the re-pack of
steam that you now use.

To begin with, I was all alone. Most people who used my re-
pack of steam were mostly people like me, who didn´t really
know how steam worked at all, and just tried all kinds off-
well, lets just call it weird things, in order to get some-
thing to work.

Already after my first, public CueSteam PLUS Release at the
RIN main forum, people got real excited because with my re-
pack people could download ALL the games from steam !!!

.. But as more and more new games became available on steam
with new security in the form of serverside protection, the
new games was NOT able to be downloaded on cracked steam at
all anymore- This is the ONLY reason why people began there
foolish attacks on me, and this is why I left that site and
started my own re-pack site.

That was the best idear I ever had really : To start my OWN
forum :-)

Now everyone is so nice to me, help me out, help me program
and code alot of new cool stuff, and thats why I would like
to say THANK YOU EVERYONE FOR MAKING PACSTEAM POSSIBLE !!!!

NOTE: I have NEVER said "Created by"- I´ve ALWAYS just said
"PRESENTS"... And that is really all I do here these days :

I ONLY "PRESENT" all the GOOD idears that we come up with !

                         PaCmAn


***********************************************************

 står det, har gjort om guiden fleeeera gånger och gör allt rätt, vad är fel?

tacksam för svar ;)

Krillenator:
Har ingenanning, Kan vara bug eller nått sånt. Försök söka på google med sökord ''Please login to the correct Steam account'' eller ''Steam validation rejected'' Jag gjorde precis med guiden & då funkade det utmärkt. prova göra om allt igen.

NOTE: Alla ni som sitter med ett riktig acc men ändå ska använda detta. Ni ska INTE installera detta i eran nuvarande mapp. Och INTE logga in på erat riktiga acc med detta. Då finns det risk att det blir bannat.
